website_summaries.verdict: This intuitive, whisper-quiet solution purifies the air inside your car, workspace, or bedroom.
pros: Dodocool’s car humidifier is extremely easy to use with a simple power button and two mist modes
It’s 180ml capacity offers seven hours and quiet and relaxing mist in intermittent mode
Creates less than 30dB of noise, and includes water leakage protection with an isolated water cup
cons: Uses cotton bar to absorb water and diffuse, which needs to be removed and cleaned relatively often

customer_reviews.title: Poor waterproofing.. broken
customer_reviews.text: I very much liked it when I first started to use it. However it stopped working after a few weeks. I never put anything in it other than distilled water so clogging wasn’t the issue. Upon further inspection I found a gap in the seal where the wires connect on the top where the water comes out of. Im sure this caused water to condense inside and caused the motherboard to corrode as you can see from the images im uploading. Also i see there is no real water proofing where you connect the power so it looks a little corroded in there as well but the power supply is still there because the lights still work.
customer_reviews.author: Ari Borud

customer_reviews.title: A humidifier for your car! How great is that?
customer_reviews.text: We’ve been using this humidifier for a couple of weeks now. Since we have another brand in our bedroom, we decided to use this one in our car. It was a great decision! We can definitely tell the difference especially since now it’s getting cold in NYC and our car heater is on. Before using this humidifier, the heat from the car would make my sinuses feel dry and I had to immediately open a window. It was a constant struggle between breathing smoothly or being cold. This humidifier makes our car rides much more comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Mimi Perez

customer_reviews.title: Good humidifier for the car while it worked.
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect my cup holder (GMC Acadia) and it does humidify the air. I think I need a second one for a large car like this... I have no leaks even when moving with the car or turning it 90 degrees... I wish it was quieter and had a bigger reservoir. April 2018 update. Unit stop working or very minor water spray being produced. I cleaned with vinager but no improvement. Throwing away...
customer_reviews.author: Gustavo Barbosa

customer_reviews.title: Humidifier
customer_reviews.text: I really don't know if this humidifier is for me, it is super tiny and honestly looks cheap in person. I do like that is has two different mist modes, continuous and intermittent and it gives you a small choice of how long to keep it on or how much mist you need. The humidifier itself works well and produces at least some mist. Reading more, I see that this is almost meant to be a car humidifier and I can see that, it would totally fit into a car cup holder.
customer_reviews.author: Dido

customer_reviews.title: Getting rusty and stop working after couple months
customer_reviews.text: The design and function of the product are great and I like it a lot. Unfortunately, the metal part in the middle (where touches the water) getting rusty after around 7 days of use. 11/1/18 update - I purchase 2nd one and it gets rusty too. Both my of diffusers stop working after couple months of use, very upset about overall quality.
customer_reviews.author: C.W.

customer_reviews.title: Great travel tool
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly useful if you are traveling. Great for those winter trips where you want to keep your sinuses fresh while you sleep. Keep it by the bed side and it will keep you fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Ace

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mom to diffuse the essential oil. She like it so much easy to carry it with you The size is perfect to put on the bedside table, office or in your car . I would denifitely buy another for me
customer_reviews.author: Sofya

customer_reviews.title: Returend item was delivered
customer_reviews.text: Amazon delivered me a product which someone returned for its malfunction. The cup and the cotton poll were wet. Yet, I still tried it, and of course, it didn't turn on. Easy to assemble, clean, and use. But they don't mean anything when the product doesn't even turn on. lol
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for my desk at work and clearing away some of those "work funks" from co workers.
customer_reviews.author: Ayanna

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap ! I like ,it is super tiny and honestly looks cheap in person. it would totally fit into a car cup holder. I like that is has two different mist modes, The humidifier itself works well and produces at least some mist. I see that this is almost meant to be a car humidifier and I like
customer_reviews.author: Jiang qiu

customer_reviews.title: The other 2 are working just fine.
customer_reviews.text: Out of the 3 humidifiers, 1 of them isn't acting right. Not sure if anyone else has this issue but this is how it looked on the inside. The other 2 are working just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Beenish Rezavi

customer_reviews.title: Question
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be working very well. Anybody know how to take out the cotton bar? Looks like it’s cover is just snapped in place but I’m not sure how to release the snaps.
customer_reviews.author: Doctor J

customer_reviews.title: Loved the sleek look and portable size
customer_reviews.text: Loved the sleek look and portable size; however, after about 45 days the unit stopped working, tried cleaning it, changing the cotton rod and it still won't work. Also, now the on/off button sticks and won't turn off. Not wasting anymore time, moving on to find a better product.
customer_reviews.author: K Corey

customer_reviews.title: Super good product
customer_reviews.text: It is mini but which very suit what i need. My small is very small so a big humidifier would block a lot of space. This mini one is perfect size plus it does its job good. Shipping is super fast. Will definitely recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Irene Ng

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working within a month
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to use it in my car and I travel only around ten miles a day. Within a month the unit stopped working and I feel like I wasted my money. Do not recommend this at all.
customer_reviews.author: Sai

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Ignored the other reviews that said this product only worked for a few days and I paid for it. It worked for a week then quit working. Save your money and buy a different brand of you want a humidifier that will work more than a few days
customer_reviews.author: Mribera92

customer_reviews.title: stopped working after 2 days
customer_reviews.text: seemed cool for the first two days then it stopped working. wast of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great little humidifier fits perfectly on my night stand. Love this minimal design and sound is relatively small.

customer_reviews.title: Very portable
customer_reviews.text: I really like this little humidifier. I use it in the car, at my desk and on my night stand. I like that it is so portable. What I don’t like is that I only have one. I needs to get another.
customer_reviews.author: Marvin TM

customer_reviews.title: healthy
customer_reviews.text: my skin is being better since i used this product. i didn't feel dry anymore. good for help.

customer_reviews.title: Not amazing.
customer_reviews.text: It died after 2 weeks of occasional use in the car.

customer_reviews.text: nice for small space’ i have it in my car’ and it works amazingly. love its portable size’

customer_reviews.title: This product has only been working for a week. ...
customer_reviews.text: This product has only been working for a week. There is very little steam coming out. I don't know why.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: so far so good, like the design that it won't leak. great for office.

customer_reviews.title: Stylish diffuser & great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the diffuser - it's quite & looks stylish and minimalistic. I had to return it as I needed a smaller size diffuser but the seller was super helpful and even offered me to pay the return shipping - great customer service!

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: lost the spring when opened the top to change the filter so now it doesn't work.

customer_reviews.title: Feel cheated
customer_reviews.text: It stopped working after one month. Very disappointed. Can't return it anymore.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Make sure the port used has enough juice.
customer_reviews.author: kaps

customer_reviews.title: Does not last long
customer_reviews.text: It was great the 1st week but after that it just stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Lawhorn

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work!
customer_reviews.text: When I received this, I plugged it in inside my house to test it, and it worked with no problem. Then I took it to my car, and it wouldn't work. Now it won't work in the house either. It worked for about one total minute.
customer_reviews.author: MEP

customer_reviews.title: It stopped working in less than a week of usage.
customer_reviews.text: I was extremely excited when this came in the mail - it worked fine for the first 3 and a half days, then it suddenly stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Good humidifier. I like it.
customer_reviews.text: Got this yesterday. Please check the pictures. The build quality is good. The amount of water it holds in the water tank is good too. I was expecting a small tank but its decent enough to work for hours. The mist works well too. At home the mist looks small but in car it looks decent. It has 2 modes continuous and intermittent. Intermittent mode throws the mist after 10 seconds for 10 seconds. I wish it has 2 functions 1. To increase the mist spray 2. To add the scented oil. The humidifier has a sticker that says not to add scented oils or perfumes. Overall, a good humidifier for a decent price.
customer_reviews.author: HarpritSingh.us

customer_reviews.title: Useful and handy gadget
customer_reviews.text: It was amazing to see how small this device is, yet it works well that I feel moisture from long streak of steam. I put one drop of Tea tree oil mixing with water, it added freshness. It is quiet useful in California, is dry weather year round. I hope it will help my nasal congestion. Even I have normal size humidifier in my bedroom and living room constantly on, during winter season, I have irritation for my nose getting dry out. Also no need mention, but this humidifier is easy to carry and to care. I am wondering could I possibly take this small humidifier in the airplane, I can plug it with USB charger, most of airlines equipped.
customer_reviews.author: Sapphire 1202

customer_reviews.title: Helpful for travel
customer_reviews.text: I have very dry eyes due to an autoimmune disease, we were planning a trip to Utah and Colorado which are crazy dry climates. I used this in the car to help counteract the dryness and it worked really well. I was surprised at how long lasting one fill up of water was and it also put out a lot of moisture. It fit in my cupholder in the front seat of the car. It was just what I was hoping for!
customer_reviews.author: P. Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for long
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be great for my dry eyes, especially for travel. I bought replacement wicks a month later. After using the humidifier a few times, I didn't use it for a few months. By then it had stopped working. I still have the replacement wicks. Shouldn't have bought them until I needed them. Lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: Cali_G

customer_reviews.title: LOVE. IT. **If mist stops coming out, just wipe mist opening!
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, love this product. It works like magic. If the mist stops, worry not. You just need to wipe the mist opening with a tissue. It's just residue build up, which will happen on a regular basis. And you're welcome! ;) I bought this humidifier because of my allergies. It helps with having some moisture in the air in my work area. USB connection is perfect. And it's small so very portable. I'm a happy camper! :) I'm finally writing this review after I purchased it almost a year ago (bought it on 4/3/18). Better late than never.
customer_reviews.author: meechelleebles

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!
customer_reviews.text: This photo was taken after one day of trying to use it. I used filtered warm water per the instuctions and filled it slightly below the max fill line. The water inself was brown when I opened it to see why it wasn't working. It vaporized practically none of the water and left a ton of rust in the bottom of the cup. This product does not work at all. MONEY DOWN THE DRAIN!
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Great presonal space humidifier
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little humidifier. I use it in my office, which is about 200 square feet. I noticed a reduction in the static electricity the first day. I run it on the constant stream for a full 8 hour (plus lunch) work day, and can typically get 2 days run out of one fill! There is no water residue on the surfaces around, nor any kind of leakage. I've used it in the car as well, but prefer it in my office. I take it home every week or two to clean it. The cotton bar does need to replaced every so often.
customer_reviews.author: Christin

customer_reviews.title: It worked great at first
customer_reviews.text: It worked great at first. But after about a month or two of use, it slowed down it's output. It's clogging somewhere and I haven't been able to find where. Also the electrodes at the bottom corrode after a month of use and need cleaning. There are no instructions on cleaning the electrodes other than to send it to an electrician to do it, which would cost more than the device.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Essential Oil Diffuser
customer_reviews.text: I got this diffuser to help keep my house smelling fresh. It does a great job of dispersing the oils around and keeping the whole house smelling clean and fresh. Each time I use it it lasts at least 7 hours. The buttons are like touch buttons so you really don't have to press, which is nice. I would definitely recommend this oil diffuser. Plus the lights look very nice and make a nice night light.
customer_reviews.author: Willow

customer_reviews.title: USB humidifier!! Wow!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this product from DODOcool, I really like the concept of this product, it looks so cool in the car , you just put in water and boom it started working , it's only water .. Take a look at the pictures , it comes with cotton bar, a product manual, a micro USB cable ..it's light weight .. I like and I hope everyone else likes it..
customer_reviews.author: Sai

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This product works really good lets out a fine mist. Bought this because sometimes the air in the bedroom gets really dry and with this unit you can allow a little bit of moisture so the air is not dry. This is only For water you cannot add anything to the water or it will damage the unit
customer_reviews.author: Abarth 695

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good...four stars
customer_reviews.text: PROS::: Small & compact, perfect for office setting or car. Works well producing steam right away. Works with essential oils. Water lasts long. Has two options of mist. CONS::: Feels a bit cheap because of the plastic. Doesn't come with a plug to go into an outlet. Not meant for a large room
customer_reviews.author: Lisa DTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Great for the long road trips
customer_reviews.text: Great for the long road trips! Had a family trip that was going to take a while but when the a/c is on in the car it dried out the air and for our new baby that a few months old that was a no go. But with this humidifier it made it so it didn't dry the air so bad in the great. Love this little thing!
customer_reviews.author: Evamaree Seders

customer_reviews.title: Does not work good with dotera oils it over fills the filter and ...
customer_reviews.text: Does not work good with dotera oils it over fills the filter and it is not vaping the water out, can't even clean it
customer_reviews.author: Elena Katlanovska

customer_reviews.title: Small compact worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: A little disappointed that you can't put essential oils in it. I was under the impression you could. This will work great in my daughters bedroom. Definitely worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Fenton

customer_reviews.title: Great for larger spaces
customer_reviews.text: I have diffusers/humidifiers in every bedroom already but needed a larger one for my living room. This one is great for larger spaces. I love that it changes colors too. White looks sleek and matches well with my decor
customer_reviews.author: Lisa DTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: All good except filter replacement procedure
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good product. Light weight, does not spill. Only issue is, replacing the filter without breaking can be a big pain. There is no instruction also to do this.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Thick gaseous air
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good for a car. The humidity doesn’t last too long though. Especially if someone opens a window or their door. But it would be great for road trips!
customer_reviews.author: Eggsbud™️

customer_reviews.title: Pretty strong!
customer_reviews.text: I use it all the time with a little bit of rose aroma when I drive. It keeps my car with good scent and my skin moisturized. The best compact humidifier I’ve ever bought and used so far!
customer_reviews.author: nike913

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: Worked once for about two minutes. Yes, I should return it but not worth the effort.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

product_meta.title: dodocool USB Humidifier Car Diffuser, Ultrasonic Cool Mist Humidifier 180ml Mini Air Humidifier with Dual Mist Mode, 90 Degree Water Leakage Protection for Car/Home/Travel/Desktop/Bedroom
product_meta.description:
Overview
dodocool 180ml Mini USB Air Humidifier is a bottle-shaped humidifier with lightweight and compact design. With ultrasonic technology, it envelops your surroundings effectively by producing cool mist to add moisture and relieve stress. Suitable for your car, office, bedroom, desk and more.

Note:
1.Please add water below the max line of the water cup.
2.DO NOT use with Hot Water, Essential Oil or Aroma.You'd better use Cold Boild Water or High Purified Distilled Water to fill it.
3.When the first installation and usage, humidifier costs about one minute to fogging, due to the cotton bar absorbs water fully.

Cleaning Tips:
Using 30 times or 30 days, cleaning and maintain the humidifier as follows:
1.The cotton bar removed from the humidifier, and squeeze out the water, then placed in the dry and ventilated place, let it dry naturally.
2.Clean the suction hole with a soft brush.Please don't wash the vaporizer with hard brush or paper.
3.Add the pure lemonade in the glass inside, make the humidifier work, could achieve the cleaning.

Specifications
Material: PP + ABS
Power source: DC 5V, 240mA
Rated power: 2W 
Working hours: Up to 3 hours for the continuous mist mode / Up to 7 hours for the intermittent mist mode
Mist coverage: Approx. 10-100 sq. ft. (1-10 square meters) 
Cup capacity: 180ml
LED light indicator: Blue / Red
Auto shut-off: Yes
Micro-USB cable length: Approx. 3.3ft / 1m
Certifications:FCC, CE, RoHS
Main item size: Approx. 6.10 * 3.07 * 3.07 in (L * W * H)
Main item weight: Approx. 6.49oz / 184g

Package includes
1 * dodocool USB Humidifier
1 * Micro-USB Cable
1 * Instruction manual
feature_bullets: [Easy to Use] As long as there is USB Power source and container, filling with cold boild water, after the internal filter was soaked, plug the device into your USB port and press the on/off button.Both the main engine and water cup are detachable.DO NOT USE WITH ESSENTIAL OIL OR AROMA.
[User-friendly Design] It can hold up to 180ml of water and produce up to 30ml of moisture per hour. Fit for most cup holders in the car. The maximum applicable area is about 100 square feet.

[Two Adjustable Mist Modes] In the continuous mist mode (Blue Light), it keeps spraying mist and supports up to 3 hours. In the intermittent mist mode (Red Light), it sprays mist and stops with an interval of 10 seconds and supports up to 7 hours.

[Whisper-quiet Operation] Creating a quiet and relaxing environment (Less Than 30dB). Low consumption and low noise make it perfect for sleeping or reading time. Work quietly without producing any bothering noises.
[Water Leakage Protection] The main control circuit board and the water cup are separated from each other, providing effective water leakage protection (within 90 degrees).

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.4 out of 5 stars147 ratings3.4 out of 5 stars
